index.welcome_description_top: On February, 24th its whole territory was attacked by Russian armed forces - from the territories of Russia and Belarus, from the sea, and the sky. They are deploying paratroopers, carrying our air strikes and shoot at us from across the border.
index.welcome_description_bottom: Thanks to the Army and the unity of Ukrainians, we are standing strong but need all the help we can get.
index.stats1_text: Estimated number of casualties in Ukraine
goals: Shout out support for Ukrainian people who leave in fear
Demand Global Leaders to stop the war in Ukraine by implementing economical, political and personal levarages
trusted_sources_links: Ukraine NOW - by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
